text: Besho did an amazing job mounting our 75-inch TV. He was professional, on time, and the cord concealment looks perfect. Highly recommend LetaGeek!
Excellent service! We had a complex smart home setup with cameras and a smart doorbell. Everything works flawlessly now. Great prices too.
Best TV mounting service in Rancho Cucamonga. Very clean work and super friendly. I will definitely be calling them again for my next project.
Quick response and same-day service! They handled my TV mount and soundbar setup perfectly. No messy wires anywhere!
